text: Stagno is a town in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Collesalvetti, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2011 census its population was . The town is about 4 km from Livorno and 12 km from Collesalvetti. == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Stagno, Collesalvetti
